Text: When making a request, try to leave it on our most recent upload because there is no notification system for when comments are posted, so we have to manually go back and check each torrent for new comments.  Thanks. :)
hey canary do you need the rest of this to enjoy? or is it starting fresh?
The series has been rebooted and her history changed, so you can definitely enjoy reading from here.  I'll see if I can find the Image (#1-16) and Maximum Press (#17-22) issues.
Yeah, sorry about the request, wasn't exactly sure where to post it. Thanks again for the upload.
